languages.text: "Почтение среди моего народа завоевывают величием, элантах. Лишь единицы твоего вида достойны нашего уважения. Я не буду менять своей дороги в угоду твоей — но ты еще можешь заслужить то отношение, которого просит твоя душа".

"Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."
languages.original_text: "Почтение среди моего народа завоевывают величием, элантах. Лишь единицы твоего вида достойны нашего уважения. Я не буду менять своей дороги в угоду твоей — но ты еще можешь заслужить то отношение, которого просит твоя душа".

traits.locale_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, not fear of someone stronger, el'antar. I will not change my path in favor of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."
"Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, not fear of someone stronger, el'antar. I will not change my path in favor of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."
"Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, not fear of someone stronger, el'antar. I will not change my path in favor of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

"Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

languages.text: “在我的同胞之中，尊重源于伟大。你的族群之中，极少有人能赢得我们的尊重，外界人。我不会因为你而改变我的道途。不过，你依然有可能赢得你的灵魂所渴求的尊重。”
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: “在我的同胞之中，尊重源于伟大，而非源于对强者的恐惧，外界人。我不会因为你而改变我的道途，不过，你依然有可能赢得你的灵魂所渴求的尊重。”

languages.text: «Entre los míos, el respeto nace de la grandeza, elantach. Hay muy pocos entre los tuyos dignos de nuestro aprecio. No cambiaré mi forma de actuar por deferencia a la tuya... pero aún puede que obtengas la estima que anhelas».
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: «Entre los míos, el respeto nace de la grandeza, no del miedo a la fuerza, elantach. No cambiaré mi forma de actuar por deferencia a la tuya... pero aún puede que obtengas la estima que anhelas».

languages.text: 「同胞の間では尊敬は偉大さから生まれる、エランタ。あなた達種族の中で敬意に値する者は極めて少ない。我が道を曲げてそちらの都合に合わせるつもりはない…だが、あなたの魂が求める敬意を得る可能性はまだある」
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞の間では尊敬は偉大さから生まれる、エランタ。あなた達種族の中で敬意に値する者は極めて少ない。我が道を曲げてそちらの都合に合わせるつもりはない…だが、あなたの魂が求める敬意を得る可能性はまだある」

languages.text: "Unter meinesgleichen entsteht Respekt aus Größe, Elantach. Es gibt unter Euresgleichen nur wenige, die unseres Respekts würdig sind. Ich werde meinen Pfad nicht für den Euren ändern – aber Ihr könnt Euch durchaus noch die Wertschätzung verdienen, die Eure Seele erstrebt."
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: "Unter meinesgleichen entsteht Respekt aus Größe, nicht aus Angst, dass jemand stärker ist, Elantach. Ich werde meinen Pfad nicht für den Euren ändern – aber Ihr könnt Euch durchaus noch die Wertschätzung verdienen, die Eure Seele erstrebt."

languages.text: « Pour les miens, c'est la grandeur qui fait naître le respect. Rares sont ceux de vos congénères qui méritent notre considération. Je ne dévierai pas de ma voie pour me conformer à vos mœurs, mais il vous est encore possible de gagner l'estime que désire votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: « Pour les miens, c'est la grandeur qui fait naître le respect, pas la crainte que l'on inspire. Je ne dévierai pas de ma voie pour me conformer à vos mœurs, mais il vous est encore possible de gagner l'estime que désire votre âme. »

languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

languages.text: "Benim türüm için saygı, kazanılan bir şeydir elantach. Türündekiler arasında saygımıza layık olan çok az kişi var. Senin uğruna yolumdan dönmeyeceğim ancak belki ruhunun arzuladığı saygınlığı hâlâ kazanabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Among my kin, respect is born of greatness, elantach. There are very few among your kind that are worthy of our respect. I will not change my path in favour of yours — but you may yet earn the esteem that your soul seeks."

traits.locale_text: "Benim türüm için saygı, kazanılan bir şeydir elantach. Türündekiler arasında saygımıza layık olan çok az kişi var. Senin uğruna yolumdan dönmeyeceğim ancak belki ruhunun arzuladığı saygınlığı hâlâ kazanabilirsin."
